page.title: 01Bowley N.E. of Dinmore
page.content: The undulating landscape is composed, mainly of farmland and deciduous woodland. The main concentration of houses being alongside Bowley Lane. Dotted within this block are farmhouses,the majority of people working here are involved with agriculture. Althogh Wickton Court houses a craft workshop involving crafts such as pottery and reupholstery. The farmland comprises of several large estates incorporating a mixture of farming enteprises. Hampton Court is well known for breeding The Hampton Court hereford cattle. Broadfield Court has several vineyards producing English wines. Bowley Court estate farms potatoes daffoils and charolais cattle. Several smaller farms are present farming sheep cattle and corn.
